listitem.para: Application Layer - Layer that all users will interact with, including all the web-based applications included in the &PRODUCTABBR; and any third-party web or mobile applications that an education organization adds to its &PRODUCTABBR;. A userâ€™s role will determine the applications to which that user has access.
Application Programming Interface - Layer that applications use to interact with the &PRODUCTABBR; Secure Data Service. It consists of one or more nodes hosting the &PRODUCTABBR; REST API.

Identity Providers (IDPs) - Displays the integrated identity solution for &PRODUCTABBR;. Shown here are SimpleIDP, which is the identity provider for &PRODUCTABBR;, and the IDPs for the state and district education agencies using this &PRODUCTABBR; deployment.
Databases - The &PRODUCTABBR; Secure Data Service with educational data from the state and district education agencies plus other data important to &PRODUCTABBR; operation.
Open LDAP and Ingestion - The portion of &PRODUCTABBR; dedicated to ingestion, the process of adding or updating large amounts of data at one time to the &PRODUCTABBR; Secure Data Service.
Background Services - The components that ensure that the &PRODUCTABBR; Secure Data Service runs smoothly and efficiently.
